Text: I got it the first time around! Awesome upload! Thanks for sharing again for those who might have missed it.

Thanks for the upload, Not sure if i have done somthing wrong but, when i try to create a flightplan with FMC i cant activate the route, the button is not there that would say activate, any help would be great, Thanks again

As i remember there was an issue with FS measurement system setting with this airplane. If u set your FS to IMPERIAL units AP and everything works fine, i had trouble with AP and systems with METRIC units. So try and see with IMPERIAL unit setting in your FSX

Thanks for the advice, but unfortuantely is not the problem as i always use imperial unit measurements, this was actually the first thing i  checked, it is only the FMC that has a problem, like i said it is when i try to activate the route before excecuting there is no hilighted "ACTIVATE" button
